title: Temporal (1d) padding
body_html: It would be nice to have 1d padding. Seems easy enough to implement, just take the 2d code and remove anything related to the height then replace "Spatial"/"2d" with "Temporal"/"1d" in the names. Anything else one has to worry about if implementing this?
body_text: It would be nice to have 1d padding. Seems easy enough to implement, just take the 2d code and remove anything related to the height then replace "Spatial"/"2d" with "Temporal"/"1d" in the names.  Anything else one has to worry about if implementing this?
